254137.<pc>が声をかけても\nディージアは 目を閉じたまま 動かない。\nどうやら:
When calls out to her, Digea remains motionless with her eyes closed. It appears that she has already lost her
breath...

254138.<pc>宛ての 手紙を見つけた。\nどうやら ディージアが 書いたもののようだ。:
I found a letter addressed to <pc>.
It seemed to be written by Digea.
<pc> read the letter.

258554.突然 こんなことになって\nきっと 驚かれたことでしょう。\nごめんなさいね。:
I am sure you must have been surprised by this
sudden turn of events. I am sorry.

258555.あなたには 隠していたけれど\nわたくしの身体は 魔瘴に 深く侵されていて\nい:
Although I didn't tell you, my body was deeply
infested with demon miasma, and it could have
gone out of control at any moment.

258556.だから あなたの衣装を 完成させられないまま\n死ぬのかしらと ハラハラしたもの:
So I was Hara Hara wondering if I would die
before I could finish your costume, but I am
so glad I made it in time.

258557.さっそく 衣装を 着てみてくださいな。\n優美だけれど 恐ろしくて おごそか。\:
Please try on the costume right away.
Graceful, yet terrifying and majestic. Isn't
this the perfect costume for Great Demon King?

258558.両肩にドクロの飾りは やっぱり 素敵。\nブラッドスピネルは 仮面に使いましたの:
The skull decorations on both shoulders are
still nice. I used Blood Spinel for the mask.
The mask is my favorite.

258559.衣装を着たあなたを 見られないのは 残念ですが\nデザイナー人生の終わりに 最高:
I'm sorry I won't be able to see you in the costumes, but I was happy to be able to make the best costumes at the end of my life as a
designer.

258560.わたくしが死ねば 心優しいあなたは\n悲しんでくださるのでしょう。\nけれど そ:
If I die, you, who are kind-hearted, will
probably be saddened. But you mustn't show
that face to anyone.

258561.あなたは 魔界を統べる お方。\n魔族も魔物も あなたの前に ひれ伏す。\n王が:
You are the ruler of the Demon World. Demons
and monsters alike will bow down before you.
The king must not show his shameful face.

258562.いつも誰かの 痛みや悲しみに 寄りそってきた\n優しい心は 仮面の下に お隠しな:
The kind heart that has always been there for
someone's pain and sorrow should be hidden
under a mask.

258563.なぜなら あなたは 大魔王なのですから。: Because you are the Great Demon King.

258564.<pc>と ショーナは\n家の近くにある墓地に ディージアのなきがらを\n埋葬し:
<pc> and Shauna buried Digea's
remains in a graveyard near their home before
returning to the Great Demon King's castle.
